title: No ultimate skin this year?
body: They keep on hinting at things, but at this rate it feels like they're not gonna make one :(

replies.body:
It's gonna be Zed.















I hope.

I was hoping there was going to one for zed (because shadows and all would make for a cool skin) but maybe next year :(
{{champion:238}}
plot twist, the ultimate skin is gonna be the oce skin
I hope not, it'd never happen if it was the oce skin.
I hope it's going to be Renekton or something.
wtf is with these new forums? :c
makes me sad cuz i know when it comes out, gg wallet.
